name: Domino Depths
description:
WHAT IS DOMINO DEPTHS?

A MINIMALISTIC, TURN-BASED, ROGUE-LIKE GAME WHERE YOU FIGHT ENEMIES IN ANCIENT RUINS GENERATED BY RANDOM DOMINOES. DOM (BROTHER) AND INOH (SISTER) ENTER A MYSTERIOUS, ANCIENT RUIN OF DOMINO DEPTHS AFTER OPENING THEIR FATHER'S MYSTERIOUS DOMINO SET.

HOW DO I PLAY?

1. USE W,A,S,D TO MOVE TO A NEW TILE. EACH TILE HAS A NUMBER. YOU COLLECT THAT NUMBER BY WALKING ON IT.

2. COLLECT NUMBERS TO GAIN ABILITIES (E.G. TWO 5S TO GAIN FIRE ABILITY).

3. HOVER OVER AN ABILITY BUTTON TO SEE IT'S RANGE.

4. PRESS ABILITY BUTTON ON THE SCREEN TO ACTIVATE IT.

5. PRESS RED SQUARE ON THE TILE TO CHOOSE WHERE TO USE IT.

6. DEFEAT ALL ENEMY GOBLINS ON THE CURRENT DEPTH (LEVEL) TO PROCEED TO THE NEXT DEPTH.

WHAT ARE THE CONTROLS?

W,A,S,D - MOVE

LEFT CLICK - ALL BUTTON ACTIONS

F12 - TOGGLE FULLSCREEN

WHAT VERSION SHOULD I PLAY?

PLEASE USE THE WINDOWS VERSION FOR THE BEST PERFORMANCE.

YOU'LL SEE SOME FRAME LAG ON THE WEB BUILD.
